[00:00.00]London Boy - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.07]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff/Cautious Clay/Mark Anthony Spears
[00:00.14]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff/Cautious Clay/Mark Anthony Spears
[00:00.22]Idris Elba：
[00:00.36]We can go driving in on my scooter ah you know just round London
[00:04.68]James Corden：
[00:05.13]Oh
[00:08.05]Taylor Swift：
[00:10.05]I love my hometown
[00:11.58]As much as Motown
[00:13.13]I love SoCal
[00:15.56]And you know I love Springsteen
[00:17.84]Faded blue jeans
[00:19.17]Tennessee whiskey
[00:22.20]But something happened
[00:23.71]I heard him laughing
[00:25.29]I saw the dimples first and
[00:26.58]Then I heard the accent
[00:28.27]They say home is where the heart is
[00:31.69]But that's not where mine lives
[00:34.05]You know I love a London boy
[00:36.02]I enjoy walking Camden Market
[00:38.33]In the afternoon
[00:39.59]He likes my American smile
[00:41.99]Like a child when our eyes meet
[00:44.07]Darling I fancy you
[00:46.29]Took me back to Highgate
[00:47.81]Met all of his best mates
[00:49.36]So I guess
[00:50.07]All the rumors are true
[00:52.24]You know I love a London boy
[00:55.40]Boy I fancy you
[01:01.52]Now I love high tea
[01:03.26]Stories from uni and the West End
[01:07.19]You can find me in the pub we
[01:09.12]Are watchin' rugby
[01:10.97]With his school friends
[01:13.93]Show me a gray sky
[01:15.37]A rainy cab ride
[01:17.07]Babes don't threaten me with a good time
[01:20.00]They say home is where the heart is
[01:23.36]But God I love the English
[01:25.60]You know I love a London boy
[01:27.71]I enjoy nights in Brixton
[01:29.64]Shoreditch in the afternoon
[01:31.87]He likes my American smile
[01:33.71]Like a child when our eyes meet
[01:35.69]Darling I fancy you
[01:37.99]Took me back to Highgate
[01:39.47]Met all of his best mates
[01:40.90]So I guess
[01:41.74]All the rumors are true
[01:43.85]You know I love a London boy
[01:47.07]Boy I fancy you
[01:50.54]So please show me Hackney
[01:52.41]Doesn't have to be Louis V
[01:54.23]Up on Bond Street
[01:55.43]Just wanna be with you wanna be with you
[02:02.65]Stick with me I'm your queen
[02:04.27]Like a Tennessee Stella McCartney
[02:06.85]On the Heath
[02:07.52]Just wanna be with you wanna be with you wanna be with you
[02:14.22]You know I love a London boy
[02:16.28]I enjoy walking Soho drinking in the afternoon
[02:20.52]He likes my American smile
[02:22.37]Like a child when our eyes meet
[02:24.29]Darling I fancy you

[02:28.10]Met all of his best mates

[02:44.03]Just wanna be with you wanna be with you

[02:59.63]I fancy you

data.trans:
[ti:London Boy]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.07]//
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.36]我们可以骑着摩托车在伦敦附近闲逛
[00:04.68]//
[00:05.13]//
[00:08.05]//
[00:10.05]我深爱我的家乡
[00:11.58]也同样爱Motown唱片公司
[00:13.13]我爱南加州
[00:15.56]我喜欢歌手Bruce Springsteen
[00:17.84]发白的蓝色牛仔裤
[00:19.17]还有田纳西威士忌
[00:22.20]缘分不期而至
[00:23.71]我听见他在笑
[00:25.29]我看到了他的酒窝
[00:26.58]听到他说话夹带着口音
[00:28.27]人们说 家是心之所属
[00:31.69]但我不一样
[00:34.05]我爱上了一个伦敦男子
[00:36.02]我喜欢逛卡姆登市场
[00:38.33]在下午的时候
[00:39.59]他喜欢我脸上美国人特有的笑容
[00:41.99]像孩子一样纯真 眼神交汇间 
[00:44.07]亲爱的 我喜欢你
[00:46.29]带我回到海格特区 
[00:47.81]见见他最好的朋友们
[00:49.36]我想
[00:50.07]那些流言并非捕风捉影
[00:52.24]我爱上了一个伦敦男子
[00:55.40]男孩 我喜欢你
[01:01.52]现在 我喜欢英式下午茶
[01:03.26]校园里的爱情和伦敦西区
[01:07.19]我就在酒吧 
[01:09.12]我们正在看橄榄球赛
[01:10.97]和他的同学们一起
[01:13.93]让我看看灰白的天空
[01:15.37]雨中出租飞驰的情形
[01:17.07]宝贝 不要用曾经的美好来胁迫我
[01:20.00]人们说 家是心之所属
[01:23.36]可我爱上了一个英国人
[01:25.60]我爱上了一个伦敦男子 
[01:27.71]我喜欢布里克斯顿的夜晚
[01:29.64]喜欢肖迪奇的下午
[01:31.87]他喜欢我脸上美国人特有的笑容
[01:33.71]像孩子一样纯真 眼神交汇间 
[01:35.69]亲爱的 我喜欢你
[01:37.99]带我回到海格特区 
[01:39.47]见见他最好的朋友们
[01:40.90]我想
[01:41.74]那些流言并非空穴来风
[01:43.85]我爱上了一个伦敦男子
[01:47.07]男孩 我喜欢你
[01:50.54]带我去哈克尼吧
[01:52.41]没必要去
[01:54.23]邦德街的LV店
[01:55.43]只想和你在一起 和你在一起
[02:02.65]留在我身边 我是你的女王
[02:04.27]我就像田纳西的Stella McCartney
[02:06.85]来到Heath
[02:07.52]只想和你在一起 和你在一起 和你在一起
[02:14.22]我爱上了一个伦敦男子
[02:16.28]我喜欢走在苏豪区的街道上 下午小酌一杯
[02:20.52]他喜欢我脸上美国人特有的笑容
[02:22.37]像孩子一样纯真 眼神交汇间 
[02:24.29]亲爱的 我喜欢你
[02:26.56]带我回到海格特区 
[02:28.10]见见他最好的朋友们
[02:29.67]我想
[02:30.39]那些流言并非空穴来风
[02:32.63]我爱上了一个伦敦男子
[02:35.70]男孩 我喜欢你
[02:39.17]带我去哈克尼吧
[02:41.00]没必要去
[02:42.98]邦德街的LV店
[02:44.03]只想和你在一起 和你在一起 和你在一起
[02:48.58]男孩 我喜欢你
[02:51.11]留在我身边 我是你的女王
[02:52.84]我就像田纳西Stella McCartney
[02:55.54]来到Heath
[02:56.15]只想和你在一起 和你在一起 和你在一起
[02:59.63]我喜欢你

[03:01.12]我喜欢你
